english.segment1: Is it okay if I want to see you every minute every day. Because I miss you. Is it alright if I want to talk for hours with you every night. Because I miss you
english.segment2: I pray to God for just one chance. To turn this into something wonderful. I pray to God for sweet romance. Cause you are something, something wonderful
english.segment3: I love the way that your face turns to a smile when you look my way. And I can't take it. And I'll be there just to take some of the burdens that you like to wear. When you can't take it
english.segment4: And just this once I pray. That God would give me grace. To say the words I want to say
